sourcesContent: import React, { Component } from 'react'; import 'react-bulma-components/dist/react-bulma-components.min.css'; import { Navbar, Button } from 'react-bulma-components'; import { FaTwitter, FaLinkedin, FaFacebook } from 'react-icons/fa'; const navbarBlogConfig = require('./config/navbarBlogConfig.json'); class AbakkusNavbar extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { 'burgerEnabled': false } } render() { return ( { this.setState({'burgerEnabled': !this.state.burgerEnabled })}}/> Home About People Insights { navbarBlogConfig.map((blogItem, key) => { return { blogItem['navbarText'] } }) } Products Alternative Investment Funds Abakkus Growth Fund - I Abakkus Emerging Opportunities Fund - I Portfolio Management Services Abakkus All Cap Approach Abakkus Emerging Opportunities Fund - I Investor Investor Login Dummy Item ) } } export default AbakkusNavbar;
